General.Name: Terregra Asia Energy PT
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: PT. Terregra Asia Energy Tbk develops, builds, and operates renewable energy projects in Indonesia. The company operates through four segments: Rental, Hydro Power, Solar Power, and Trading. It also involved in developing hydro and solar power projects. The company was formerly known as PT. Mitra Megatama Perkasa and changed its name to PT. Terregra Asia Energy Tbk in 2016. PT. Terregra Asia Energy Tbk was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Jakarta Barat, Indonesia.
General.Address: Lippo Puri Tower, Jakarta Barat, Indonesia, 11610
